agencies.name: Miller Ad Agency
unique_selling_points: Quality work delivered in timely manner

dallas.note: Most Dallas agencies do not publicly display pricing on their websites or Google Maps listings. Custom quotes required.

key_findings.pricing_transparency: Chicago agencies (especially Comrade) are more transparent with pricing. Dallas agencies prefer custom quotes.
key_findings.service_similarity: All agencies offer core digital marketing services (SEO, PPC, Web Design, Social Media)
key_findings.package_structures: Monthly retainer models are standard, ranging from $599/mo to $4,299/mo for comprehensive services
key_findings.roi_focus: Agencies emphasize ROI and measurable results in their messaging
key_findings.industry_specialization: Common focus areas include home services, healthcare, legal, restaurants, and small businesses

comrade: Proven case studies with specific metrics
Dedicated team structure (niche experts + account manager + CMO)
agency_creative: Strong restaurant and food industry expertise
miller_ad_agency: Highest review count in Dallas (113 reviews)

recommended_pricing_strategy.voice_ai_starter: $997/mo - Competitive entry point below Comrade's PPC package
recommended_pricing_strategy.voice_ai_enterprise: $3,997/mo - Competitive with Comrade's all-in-one package while offering specialized Voice AI value
recommended_pricing_strategy.rationale: These prices position competitively against established Chicago/Dallas agencies while emphasizing the unique value of Voice AI automation, which most competitors don't offer
